name: Hero Cover
description: Hero sections are used to introduce the product or service. They are the first and primary section of the website. This is a centered hero section with a large title, a subtitle and two buttons.

strings.description: Main title of the hero section
Primary button text of the hero section
Secondary button text of the hero section

images.description: Background image of the hero section

name: Content Plain
description: Content columns are used to provide more detailed information about the product or service. This is a single column content section.

strings.description: Main content of the content section

name: Feature Columns
description: Feature columns are used to highlight the main features of the product or service. This section is a two column grid.

strings.description: Button text of the first feature
Button text of the second feature

name: Testimonial Centered
description: Testimonial sections are used to show what customers think about the product or service. This section is a centered testimonial.

strings.description: Name of an author, preferably a dummy name

name: Content on Background
description: Content sections are used to provide more detailed information about the product or service. This is a content section with an image on center.

strings.description: Buttont ext for the content section

images.description: Image in the center of the content section

name: Call to action 2
description: Call to action sections are used to encourage users to take an action. This is a call to action section with an action button on the bottom.

strings.description: Main title of the call to action section
Subtitle of the call to action section
Button text of the call to action section
